mapper.select: select receipt_number as id from charge_receipt where charge_id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM request_detail LEFT JOIN charge_request ON request_detail.`request_id` = charge_request.`request_id` LEFT JOIN record_charge ON charge_request.`patient_id` = record_charge.`patient_id` LEFT JOIN charge_receipt ON record_charge.`id` = charge_receipt.`charge_id` WHERE charge_receipt.`charge_id`= #{receiptId}

SELECT request_detail.item_id,request_detail.item_type,request_detail.refund_reason,request_detail.item_count, charge_pay.channel_order,charge_pay.channel_account,charge_pay.fee_paid FROM `request_detail` LEFT JOIN charge_request ON request_detail.`request_id`=charge_request.`request_id` LEFT JOIN `record_charge` ON charge_request.`patient_id`=record_charge.`patient_id` LEFT JOIN `charge_pay` ON record_charge.`id`=charge_pay.`id` WHERE request_detail.`request_id`=#{requestId} and request_detail.`status` BETWEEN 1 and 3 GROUP BY record_charge.`id`
select fee_refund,fee_paid from charge_pay where charge_id = #{requestId}
mapper.update: update charge_receipt set charge_receipt.status = 4 where charge_receipt.receipt_number = #{requestId}
update record_charge set refund_time = #{date}, status=#{status}, toll_collector_id=#{userName} where id =#{requestId}
update charge_pay set refund_time = #{date}, fee_refund = #{money}, status=#{status}, toll_collector_id=#{userName} where charge_id =#{requestId}
mapper.select: select receipt_number from invoice where status=0

SELECT request_charge_info.`fee_final`, charge_pay.channel_order, charge_pay.channel_account, charge_pay.`status`, charge_pay.`id`, charge_pay.fee_paid FROM request_charge_info LEFT JOIN charge_request ON request_charge_info.`request_id` = charge_request.`request_id` LEFT JOIN record_charge ON charge_request.`patient_id` = record_charge.`patient_id` LEFT JOIN charge_pay ON record_charge.`id` = charge_pay.`charge_id` WHERE 1 = 1 AND record_charge.`status` BETWEEN '1' AND '2' AND request_charge_info.`request_id` = #{requestId} AND request_charge_info.`item_id` = #{itemId} GROUP BY request_charge_info.`id`

SELECT SUM(charge_pay.`fee_paid`) AS money FROM charge_request LEFT JOIN record_charge ON charge_request.patient_id = record_charge.patient_id LEFT JOIN charge_pay ON record_charge.id = charge_pay.charge_id LEFT JOIN dict_channel_type ON charge_pay.channel_type_id = dict_channel_type.id WHERE charge_request.request_id = #{requestId} GROUP BY dict_channel_type.`id` ORDER BY dict_channel_type.`id` ASC
mapper.update: update invoice set status=2 where receipt_number=#{num}
